special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
At the beginning of your main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to Into the Guum Wilds’s stage. [i](If it has more than three defense counters on it, it’s in stage one.)[/i]
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
When this expedition reaches stage 2, you gain 3 life.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
At the beginning of your end step, draw a card.
